original_text:
1 Left Alive
Tra i temi che vengono presi maggiormente nella creazione dei film ma, soprattutto, delle serie televisive, è l’apocalisse zombie. C’è sempre più paura tra la popolazione che, per colpa di qualche virus, ci si possa trasformare in zombie e cominciare a popolare la Terra.
Yggdrasil sente molto questo problema sociale, per questo ha deciso di creare una Slot Machine sull’argomento. Ti possiamo assicurare che è stata fatto solo per sensibilizzare sull’argomento zombie!
Continua a leggere per saperne di più.
Una delle migliori grafiche sul mercato
La storia dell’apocalisse zombie può piacere o meno, ma una cosa è oggettivamente corretta e tutti gli utenti concordano a riguardo: 1 Left Alive prodotta da Yggdrasil è una delle Slot Machine con la grafica migliore sul mercato.
Immagina di essere l’ultima persona rimasta sulla Terra e di dover combattere contro i morti viventi. Yggdrasil ha cercato di dare la stessa sensazione elettrizzante grazie ad un motore di gioco incredibile e realistico.
Più avanti ti parleremo delle funzioni speciali che rendono questa griglia 5×4 una delle più vincenti in assoluto. Per ora ti diciamo che lo sfondo non è sempre lo stesso, ma cambia con gli scenari. Ti potresti ritrovare in una foresta cupa dai toni blu-nero, oppure all’interno di una stanza circondato da migliaia di zombie.
I simboli sono curati nei minimi dettagli, dalle lettere J, Q, K e Asso del Poker, alle immagini degli zombie che ti permettono di vincere un sacco di soldi.
Ma per conoscere tutte le funzioni devi continuare a leggere!
Le funzioni vincenti di questa Slot
Ti abbiamo detto che 1 Left Alive di Yggdrasil è una delle Slot Machine più vincenti sul mercato. Nonostante la griglia sia un classico 5×4, devi sapere che ci sono ben 1.024 linee di pagamento. Ma non solo! Questa Slot Machine, infatti, ha un’incredibile funzione chiamata Ways + Game Engine, che noi possiamo riassumere come “funzione a cascata”. Ottenendo delle combinazioni vincenti sul primo rullo, infatti, i simboli scorrono verso il basso e si possono creare altre combinazioni vincenti con quelli che c’erano già. Per questo si può dire che 1 Left Alive non abbia solo 1.024 linee di pagamento, ma fino ad un massimo di 32.768!
Si tratta di numeri incredibili, che dovrebbero essere compensati da un basso RTP. Invece, andando a guardare a quanto si stima il payout, si legge ben 97%, un numero decisamente più alto della media, che solitamente si aggira sui 95.5%-96%.
Che dire? Ti dicevamo che si tratta di una delle Slot più vincenti sul mercato!
Un simbolo molto importante è il Bloody Wild, che permette di trasformare ogni zombie sulla griglia in uno Scatter, che non sparisce dopo una singola giocata, ma si limita scorrere in basso fino ad uscire dall’ultimo rullo. In questo modo potrai vincere fino a 700 giri gratis.
Un’altra Slot Machine simile
Se sei appassionato di zombie, non possiamo fare altro che consigliarti il Walking Dead Slot Game 2. Si tratta di una delle più belle graficamente parlando sul mercato, ed è stata prodotta da Aristocrat. Potrai giocare con tutti i personaggi principali della serie e cercare di vincere il Jackpot progressivo che parte da 500.000 dollari.

raw_translation.response:
"1 Left Alive"

Among the themes that are most frequently taken in the creation of films and, above all, television series, is the zombie apocalypse. There is increasing fear among the population that, due to some virus, people could be transformed into zombies and begin to populate the Earth.

Yggdrasil is very aware of this social problem, which is why they decided to create a slot machine on the topic. We can assure you that it was made solely to raise awareness about the zombie issue!

Continue reading to find out more.

One of the Best Graphics on the Market

The zombie apocalypse story may or may not be your cup of tea, but one thing is objectively correct and all users agree on it: 1 Left Alive produced by Yggdrasil is one of the best graphic slot machines on the market.

Imagine being the last person on Earth and having to fight against the undead. Yggdrasil has tried to give the same exhilarating feeling thanks to an incredible and realistic game engine.

Later on, we'll talk about the special features that make this 5x4 grid one of the most winning on the market. For now, we can say that the background is not always the same, but changes with the scenarios. You could find yourself in a dark forest with blue-black tones, or inside a room surrounded by thousands of zombies.

The symbols are carefully designed, from the J, Q, K and Ace Poker letters to the images of zombies that allow you to win a lot of money.

But to know all the functions, you have to keep reading!

The Winning Features of this Slot

We told you that Yggdrasil's 1 Left Alive is one of the most winning slot machines on the market. Although the grid is a classic 5x4, you should know that there are 1,024 paylines. But not only that! This slot machine, in fact, has an incredible feature called Ways + Game Engine, which we can summarize as "cascade function". Getting winning combinations on the first reel, in fact, the symbols slide down and other winning combinations can be created with those that were already there. This means that 1 Left Alive doesn't have only 1,024 paylines, but up to a maximum of 32,768!

These are incredible numbers that should be compensated by a low RTP. Instead, looking at what the payout is estimated at, you'll read a whopping 97%, a number considerably higher than the average, which usually hovers around 95.5% to 96%.

What else can we say? We told you that this is one of the most winning slots on the market!

A very important symbol is the Bloody Wild, which allows you to transform every zombie on the grid into a Scatter, which does not disappear after a single play but only scrolls down until it exits the last reel. In this way, you can win up to 700 free spins.

Another similar slot machine

If you're a zombie fan, we can only recommend the Walking Dead Slot Game 2. It is one of the most beautiful graphically speaking on the market, and it was produced by Aristocrat. You can play with all the main characters of the series and try to win the progressive jackpot starting at $500,000.

1 Left Alive has some of the best graphics on the market. The game engine is incredibly realistic, with changing backgrounds like a dark forest with blue-black tones. The symbols are also carefully designed with the Poker letters and zombie images that allow you to win money.

Paylines

With 1,024 paylines and an incredible feature called Ways + Game Engine, which includes a cascade function, players can enjoy even more opportunities to win. The cascade feature means that 1 Left Alive doesn't only have 1,024 paylines but up to a maximum of 32,768. These numbers are extraordinary for a 5x4 grid.

Payout Percentage

1 Left Alive has an impressively high payout percentage estimated at 97%. This number is much higher than the average of 95.5% to 96% in most other online slot games. This feature is why 1 Left Alive is one of the most winning slots on the market.

Special Symbols/Features

The Bloody Wild symbol is crucial in this slot and transforms every zombie on the grid into a Scatter symbol. The Scatter symbol remains and only scrolls down until it leaves the last reel, and this triggers a bonus of up to 700 free spins. The Ways + Game Engine in 1 Left Alive implements a cascade function, which means getting winning combinations on the first reel; the feature allows symbols to slide down and create other winning combinations, increasing opportunities for more significant wins.

Alternative Recommendations

For those who love zombies, another recommendation is the Walking Dead Slot Game 2, produced by Aristocrat. The graphics are stunning, and users can play with all the main characters of the series and try to win the progressive jackpot starting at $500,000.

Review: "1 Left Alive"

Among the themes that are most frequently taken in the creation of films and, above all, television series, is the zombie apocalypse. There is increasing fear among the population that, due to some virus, people could be transformed into zombies and begin to populate the Earth.

Yggdrasil is very aware of this social problem, which is why they decided to create a slot machine on the topic. We can assure you that it was made solely to raise awareness about the zombie issue!

Continue reading to find out more.

One of the Best Graphics on the Market

The zombie apocalypse story may or may not be your cup of tea, but one thing is objectively correct and all users agree on it: 1 Left Alive produced by Yggdrasil is one of the best graphic slot machines on the market.

Imagine being the last person on Earth and having to fight against the undead. Yggdrasil has tried to give the same exhilarating feeling thanks to an incredible and realistic game engine.

Later on, we'll talk about the special features that make this 5x4 grid one of the most winning on the market. For now, we can say that the background is not always the same, but changes with the scenarios. You could find yourself in a dark forest with blue-black tones, or inside a room surrounded by thousands of zombies.

The symbols are carefully designed, from the J, Q, K and Ace Poker letters to the images of zombies that allow you to win a lot of money.

But to know all the functions, you have to keep reading!

The Winning Features of this Slot

We told you that Yggdrasil's 1 Left Alive is one of the most winning slot machines on the market. Although the grid is a classic 5x4, you should know that there are 1,024 paylines. But not only that! This slot machine, in fact, has an incredible feature called Ways + Game Engine, which we can summarize as "cascade function". Getting winning combinations on the first reel, in fact, the symbols slide down and other winning combinations can be created with those that were already there. This means that 1 Left Alive doesn't have only 1,024 paylines, but up to a maximum of 32,768!

These are incredible numbers that should be compensated by a low RTP. Instead, looking at what the payout is estimated at, you'll read a whopping 97%, a number considerably higher than the average, which usually hovers around 95.5% to 96%.

What else can we say? We told you that this is one of the most winning slots on the market!

A very important symbol is the Bloody Wild, which allows you to transform every zombie on the grid into a Scatter, which does not disappear after a single play but only scrolls down until it exits the last reel. In this way, you can win up to 700 free spins.

Another similar slot machine

If you're a zombie fan, we can only recommend the Walking Dead Slot Game 2. It is one of the most beautiful graphically speaking on the market, and it was produced by Aristocrat. You can play with all the main characters of the series and try to win the progressive jackpot starting at $500,000.
